ComicInfo.Summary:
Just what the title implies: a satirical look at the past year.
This month’s item is Pamela Anderson’s breast implants.

ComicInfo.Title: The Dumbest People, Events and Things of 2002; A Mad Look at Golf; Mad's Ecchbay Item of the Month; Monroe and… Wedded Bliss; Duke Bissell’s Tales of Undisputed Interest; Christmas Carols for Post 9/11 America; A Mad Exclusive! George W. Bush’s Notes From His Last Cabinet Meeting; Satirize That
